entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
